gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Lakers 136, Hawks 105
gameRecap.excerpt: The Lakers defeated the Hawks, 136-105. DAngelo Russell led the way for the Lakers with 27 points (6-10 3pt. FG) and 10 assists, while LeBron James (25 points, seven rebounds, 10 assists) and Anthony Davis (22 points, 15 rebounds, six assists) added a combined 47 points in the victory. Jalen Johnson tallied 25 points, nine rebounds and four assists for the Hawks in the losing effort. The Lakers improve to 37-32 on the season, while the Hawks fall to 30-38.
